extendedInfo.description: The COMPLETE One Direction Fan App!FEATURES:â¢ Interact with other 1D fans through the Fan Chat!â¢ Voice your opinion with a monthly Fan Question!â¢ Compete with other fan-bases in the Fan Battle!â¢ Test your skills with the challenging Jigsaw Puzzle Game!â¢ Stay updated with the latest news on One Direction!â¢ Watch their hottest videos, including featured In-App Videos!â¢ Read more information about One Direction!â¢ View 1Ds photos on Instagram!â¢ Stay connected with their official Facebook and Twitter feeds!â¢ Plus so much more!ABOUT ONE DIRECTION: One Direction are an English-Irish pop boy band based in London, consisting of members Niall Horan, Zayn Malik, Liam Payne, Harry Styles, and Louis Tomlinson. They signed with Simon Cowell's record label Syco Records after being formed and finishing third in the seventh series of British televised singing competition The X Factor in 2010. Propelled to international success by the power of social media, their two albums Up All Night and Take Me Home, released in 2011 and 2012 respectively, broke several records, topped the charts of most major markets, and generated hit singles, including "What Makes You Beautiful" and "Live While We're Young". Often described as sparking the resurgence in the boy band concept, and of forming part of a new "British Invasion" in the United States, the group have sold over 14 million singles and 8 million albums, as noted by the band's management company, Modest! Management. Their achievements include two BRIT Awards and three MTV Video Music Awards. According to Nick Gatfield, the chairman and chief executive of Sony Music Entertainment UK, One Direction represented a $50 million business empire by June 2012. They were proclaimed 2012's "Top New Artist" by Billboard, while The Huffington Post named 2012 "The Year of One Direction". A 3D film about the group, "1D: This Is Us", directed by Morgan Spurlock, will be released on August 30th, 2013.DISCLAIMER: One Direction FanFront is not affiliated with or endorsed by One Direction, their management, or their record label. We are simply fans, showing our support for these amazing artists. No copyright infringement is intended. Please contact us with any questions or requests for content removal.
